title: Bangkok G Story
overview: A series of life story of three gay friends in the great gay metropolis, Bangkok. "G" is focused on work and his motto is "Nothing if sex, just work", Unlike "T", a catchy stallion who only thinks about sex. Sharing the scene, although "B" an unoccupied person who thinks almost like "T", but receives many gifts in sex lair. Each with its personality, lifestyle and quirks...
